testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say

0.q: What is IPL and how does it work?
0.a: IPL (Intense Pulsed Light) uses broad-spectrum light to target hair follicles, safely and effectively reducing hair growth.

1.a: Yes, we provide complete customization of features, colors, packaging, and more to match your brand needs.

2.a: We support FDA, CE, RoHS, and other global certifications to ensure compliance with your target markets.

3.q: How long is the production lead time?
3.a: Typical lead time is 25-35 days after sample approval, depending on order size and customization.

4.a: Yes, we provide comprehensive after-sales service including technical support and warranty.

5.a: Certainly. We provide reliable worldwide shipping to support your business wherever you are.

hero.title: Custom Logo Printing
hero.subtitle: iShine offers professional logo customization for IPL devices—choose UV printing for speed and value, or screen printing for premium, lasting results.

screenPrinting.label: Screen Printing
screenPrinting.description: Premium finish, crisp lines, and excellent durability—ideal for brands seeking the best tactile and visual effect. Slightly higher cost, but preferred for orders over 20 units. Supports 1-2 color logos on curved surfaces.

surface.label: Surface Compatibility
surface.value: Both methods work on the slightly curved IPL device body.

moq.label: MOQ for Screen Printing
moq.value: Best value for orders over 20 units.

premium.label: Premium Choice
premium.value: Screen printing delivers the most premium finish and tactile feel for your brand logo.

cta.title: Ready to Brand Your IPL Device?
cta.subtitle: Our team will help you choose the best logo printing method for your project—ensuring your brand stands out.

precisionFace.name: Precision Face Head
precisionFace.application: Upper lip, chin, jawline precision treatment
precisionFace.features: Extra UV filter, flat design for facial contours

largeBody.name: Large Body Head

largeBody.features: Curved-in design for maximum skin contact

sapphire.title: Sapphire Cooling Technology
sapphire.painReduction: **90% pain reduction** for sensitive and dark skin types
sapphire.safeSkinTypes: Safe for Fitzpatrick skin types I-IV

recognition.title: Intelligent Attachment Recognition
recognition.adaptation: Automatic treatment program adaptation per body area
recognition.recognition: Smart head recognition for optimal energy settings
recognition.safety: Built-in safety protocols for each attachment type

benefits.title: Proven Multi-Head Advantages

benefits.painReduction: Pain reduction with sapphire cooling attachments

retail.title: Retail & Supermarket

luxury.title: Luxury & Gift Packaging

design.label: Design Principle

customization.label: Customization

about.heroDesc: Ihr vertrauenswürdiger Partner in der IPL-Geräteherstellung, der innovative Beauty-Technologie von der Idee zum Markt bringt, seit 2018.
about.storyP1: Gegründet im Jahr 2018, entstand iShine aus einer Vision, fortschrittliche IPL-Technologie zu demokratisieren. Wir erkannten, dass Beauty-Marken einen zuverlässigen Partner brauchten, der ihre Ideen mit Präzision und Exzellenz in marktreife Produkte verwandeln konnte.
about.storyP2: Heute sind wir stolz darauf, Kunden auf drei Kontinenten zu bedienen, von innovativen Startups bis hin zu etablierten Beauty-Konglomeraten. Unser Engagement für Qualität, Innovation und Kundenerfolg treibt alles an, was wir tun.
about.storyP3: Bei iShine stellen wir nicht nur Geräte her - wir entwickeln Lösungen, die Marken befähigen, im wettbewerbsintensiven Beauty-Markt erfolgreich zu sein.
about.valuesDesc: Die Prinzipien, die unsere Arbeit und Beziehungen zu Kunden leiten

values.qualityDesc: FDA GMP-zertifizierte Herstellung mit strenger Qualitätskontrolle
values.customerDesc: Dediziert zum Verständnis und Übertreffen der Kundenerwartungen
values.globalDesc: Bedienung von Beauty-Marken weltweit mit innovativen IPL-Lösungen
values.innovationDesc: Kontinuierliche F&E-Investitionen in IPL-Technologie der nächsten Generation

about.journeyDesc: Wichtige Meilensteine in unserem Wachstum und unserer Innovation

2019.title: Erster internationaler Kunde
2019.desc: Partnerschaft mit KU-2 Cosmetic in Deutschland

hero.title: From Challenge to Change: The iShine Journey
hero.subtitle: The IPL industry struggled with high costs, limited customization, and technical hurdles. iShine was founded to break this mold—empowering businesses worldwide with next-generation IPL technology and a seamless path from idea to market.

origin.title: Our Origin
origin.content: Founded with a vision to democratize advanced IPL technology, iShine emerged from the recognition that innovation was stifled by high costs and limited accessibility in the beauty device market.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To make advanced IPL solutions accessible, customizable, and scalable for every visionary brand, breaking down barriers to innovation in the beauty technology space.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the global leader in democratizing advanced beauty technology, empowering brands worldwide to bring innovative IPL solutions to market with confidence and success.

values.title: Our Values
values.content: Innovation, collaboration, quality, and customer-centricity drive everything we do. We believe in building lasting partnerships and delivering excellence in every project.

hero.title: Core Principles
hero.subtitle: The foundational values that guide our approach to innovation, quality, and customer success.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.content: We continuously push the boundaries of what's possible in IPL technology, investing in R&D to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.content: Every product we manufacture meets the highest standards of quality, safety, and performance.

partnership.title: Partnership Approach
partnership.content: We work collaboratively with our clients, treating their success as our own and providing comprehensive support.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.content: We believe advanced technology should be accessible to all, not just large corporations.

hero.title: Founder's Message
hero.subtitle: A personal message from our founder about the journey, vision, and commitment to excellence.

message.title: Dear Partners and Friends
message.content: When we started iShine, we saw an industry where innovation was limited by high costs and complex barriers. Our mission was clear: democratize advanced IPL technology and make it accessible to visionary brands worldwide. Today, I'm proud to say we've built more than a manufacturing company—we've created a partnership ecosystem that empowers success.

vision.title: Our Vision for the Future
vision.content: We envision a world where every brand, regardless of size, can access the latest beauty technology innovations. Our commitment to R&D, quality, and partnership ensures we remain at the forefront of IPL technology advancement.

hero.title: Global Witness
hero.subtitle: Discover how iShine is making a difference worldwide through innovation, quality, and partnership.

impact.title: Global Impact
impact.content: Our technology and solutions have reached over 50 countries, empowering brands to bring innovative IPL products to market and improve lives through advanced beauty technology.

partnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
partnerships.content: We've built lasting relationships with leading brands, distributors, and technology partners worldwide, creating a network of innovation and success.

countryPage.title: iShine - IPL Device Manufacturing Solutions | Global
countryPage.description: Leading IPL device manufacturer providing OEM/ODM solutions from idea to market worldwide.

howToUse.heroDescription: Complete guide to safe and effective IPL hair removal. Learn proper techniques, safety guidelines, and get the best results from your IPL device.

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Clean and prepare the treatment area

details.shave: Shave the treatment area 24-48 hours before use
details.clean: Clean skin thoroughly with mild soap and water
details.remove: Remove any makeup, lotions, or deodorants

deviceSetup.title: Device Setup
deviceSetup.description: Power on and configure your IPL device

details.connect: Connect the device to power source
details.power: Press the power button to turn on
details.intensity: Select appropriate intensity level (start with lowest)
details.attach: Ensure the treatment head is properly attached

skinToneTest.title: Skin Tone Test
skinToneTest.description: Perform a patch test for safety

details.test: Test on a small, inconspicuous area first
details.wait: Wait 24 hours to check for adverse reactions
details.adjust: Adjust intensity if needed based on skin response
details.proceed: Proceed only if no irritation occurs

details.press: Press flash button for each pulse
details.move: Move to adjacent area without overlapping

details.cooling: Apply cooling gel or aloe vera if needed
details.sunscreen: Use SPF 30+ sunscreen when going outside

warnings.title: Important Safety Warnings
warnings.point1: Never use on tanned, sunburned, or irritated skin
warnings.point2: Do not use on moles, tattoos, or dark spots
warnings.point3: Avoid eye area and mucous membranes
warnings.point4: Not suitable for pregnant or breastfeeding women
warnings.point5: Consult doctor if you have skin conditions

eyeProtection.title: Eye Protection
eyeProtection.point1: Always wear protective goggles when provided
eyeProtection.point2: Never look directly at the light flash
eyeProtection.point3: Keep device away from eye area
eyeProtection.point4: Ensure others in room are also protected

skinSensitivity.title: Skin Sensitivity
skinSensitivity.point3: Stop immediately if pain or discomfort occurs
skinSensitivity.point4: Allow 48-72 hours between treatments on same area

weeks1to4.description: Initial treatment phase for hair reduction

weeks5to8.description: Maintenance phase as hair growth slows

weeks9to12.description: Final phase for remaining hair follicles

after12weeks.description: Touch-up treatments for new hair growth

deviceNotTurningOn.solution1: Check power connection and ensure device is plugged in
deviceNotTurningOn.solution2: Verify power button is pressed firmly
deviceNotTurningOn.solution3: Check if device needs charging (for battery models)
deviceNotTurningOn.solution4: Contact customer support if issue persists

noLightFlash.problem: No light flash when pressing button
noLightFlash.solution1: Ensure device is in full contact with skin
noLightFlash.solution2: Check if safety sensors are blocked
noLightFlash.solution3: Verify treatment head is properly attached
noLightFlash.solution4: Clean the light window and sensors

skinIrritation.solution1: Apply cooling gel or aloe vera to soothe skin
skinIrritation.solution2: Reduce intensity level for next treatment

noResults.problem: No visible results after several treatments
noResults.solution2: Verify you are using appropriate intensity level
noResults.solution3: Check that hair color is suitable for IPL (dark hair works best)
noResults.solution4: Be patient - results typically visible after 4-6 treatments

q1.question: How long does each treatment session take?
q1.answer: Treatment time varies by area size. Face typically takes 5-10 minutes, legs 15-20 minutes, and full body can take 30-45 minutes.

q2.question: When will I see results?
q2.answer: Most users see initial hair reduction after 3-4 treatments. Significant results are typically visible after 6-8 treatments over 2-3 months.

q3.question: Is IPL treatment painful?
q3.answer: Most users describe the sensation as a mild rubber band snap. Modern IPL devices with cooling technology minimize discomfort significantly.

q4.question: Can I use IPL on all skin tones?
q4.answer: IPL works best on light to medium skin tones with dark hair. Always perform a patch test and consult the device manual for skin tone compatibility.

q5.question: How long do results last?
q5.answer: IPL provides long-lasting hair reduction. Most users enjoy smooth skin for 6-12 months, with occasional touch-up treatments as needed.

q6.question: Can I use IPL during summer?
q6.answer: Yes, but extra sun protection is essential. Avoid sun exposure 48 hours before and after treatment, and always use SPF 30+ sunscreen.

iplHairRemoval.heroDescription: Discover the next generation of IPL hair removal devices—safe, effective, and designed for all skin types. Experience salon-quality results at home or in your business.
iplHairRemoval.iplDevicesDescription: Explore our full lineup of advanced IPL hair removal devices, each engineered for maximum comfort and results.
iplHairRemoval.accessoriesDescription: Enhance your IPL experience with our range of certified accessories for safety and convenience.
iplHairRemoval.smartTechnologyIntegrationDescription: Our IPL devices feature intelligent sensors and app connectivity for personalized, safe, and effective treatments.
iplHairRemoval.coolingComfortSystemsDescription: Sapphire and metal plate cooling keep your skin comfortable and protected during every session.
iplHairRemoval.intelligentSkinSensorsDescription: Automatic skin tone and hair detection ensures optimal energy delivery and safety for every user.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered IPL Device
aiPowered.desc: The future of hair removal is here. Artificial intelligence optimizes every treatment for personalized, effective results.

batteryPowered.title: Battery-Powered IPL Hair Removal Device
batteryPowered.desc: Experience the ultimate cordless convenience with our battery-powered IPL device. Equipped with a high-capacity rechargeable battery, it offers seamless mobility without the need for power adapters. Enjoy professional-grade hair removal anywhere, anytime, with up to 9 adjustable energy levels for personalized treatments.

features.cordless: Cordless design for ultimate freedom and convenience.
features.energyLevels: 9 adjustable energy levels for customized treatments.
features.longBattery: Long-lasting rechargeable battery with 600+ recharge cycles.
features.noAdapter: No need for power adapters during use, ideal for travel.
features.allSkin: Suitable for all skin tones, FDA & CE approved.

dualLamp.title: Dual-Lamp IPL Device
dualLamp.desc: Double the power, double the efficiency. Revolutionary dual-lamp technology for faster treatments and superior results.

emerald.title: Emerald IPL Hair Removal Device
emerald.desc: Experience professional-grade hair removal at home with our Emerald IPL Device featuring advanced Intense Pulsed Light technology with 15 J/cm² of energy and 600,000+ flashes for long-lasting smooth skin. The precision-engineered system delivers consistent results across all treatment areas.

features.proResults: Professional results — up to 94% hair reduction after 12 weeks.
features.manualIntensity: 5-level manual intensity control for personalized treatments.
features.safeAllSkin: Safe for all skin tones within Fitzpatrick I-V range.
features.largeWindow: Large 4.2 cm² treatment window for faster coverage.
features.ergonomic: Ergonomic design with built-in safety sensors.

handheld.title: Handheld IPL Hair Removal Device
handheld.desc: Discover the perfect blend of comfort and performance with our handheld IPL device. Designed for easy grip and precise control, it features 5 adjustable energy levels to suit all skin types and sensitivities. Achieve salon-quality hair removal results at home with a lightweight, portable device.

features.ergonomic: Ergonomic handheld design for comfortable use.
features.energyLevels: 5 adjustable energy levels for personalized treatments.
features.portable: Lightweight and portable—ideal for travel and home use.
features.allSkin: Suitable for all skin tones, gentle and effective.
features.certified: FDA & CE approved for safety and quality.

iceCooling.title: Ice Cooling IPL Hair Removal Device
iceCooling.desc: Experience professional-grade luxurious ice cooling hair removal technology, featuring an aerospace-grade cooling metal plate that instantly cools the skin to 5°C ultra-low temperature. Combined with 2.0~5.0 J/cm² high-energy IPL pulses and 999,000+ flashes, it delivers a goddess-like silky skin experience. The luxurious design is crafted for perfection-seeking modern women.

features.luxuryDesign: Luxurious goddess design — Aerospace-grade metal texture, showcasing noble taste.
features.coolingPlate: Ice cooling plate technology — Instantly cools skin to 5°C for truly painless experience.
features.preciseControl: 9-level precise energy control — Customizable for sensitive areas and coarse hair.
features.allSkin: Suitable for all skin tones — Fitzpatrick I-V certified.
features.largeWindow: 3.3 cm² extra-large treatment window — Fast coverage, 50% higher efficiency.

iceFeeling.title: Sapphire Ice Feeling IPL Device
iceFeeling.desc: Enjoy painless hair removal with a clinical-grade Sapphire cooling plate that chills skin to 5°C, enabling higher energy pulses for quicker results. The integrated Intense Pulsed Light (IPL) engine delivers 2.0~5.0 J/cm² of energy with 999,999 flashes for a lifetime of use.

features.longSmooth: Long-lasting smoothness — visible reduction after 3-4 weeks.
features.cooling: Cooling plate keeps epidermis at 5°C for true painless treatments.
features.energyLevels: Five energy levels adapt to almost all skin tones within Fitzpatrick I-V.
features.flashModes: Auto/Manual flash modes for body and precision areas.
features.multiUse: 4-in-1: Full body, Bikini, Face, and skin rejuvenation.

skinSensor.title: Skin Sensor IPL Device
skinSensor.desc: Experience the safest and most intelligent home hair removal with our Skin Sensor IPL Device. This revolutionary device features advanced optical skin sensors that automatically detect your skin tone and hair color — delivering personalized treatment intensity for maximum effectiveness and complete safety. With real-time skin analysis and automatic energy adjustment, this device is perfect for all suitable skin types and ensures optimal results every time.

features.intelligentDetection: Intelligent Skin Detection — Advanced sensors automatically identify skin tone and adjust energy levels
features.maxSafety: Maximum Safety — Prevents over-treatment and reduces risk of skin irritation or burns
features.personalized: Personalized Treatment — Automatically optimizes intensity for your unique skin characteristics
features.realTime: Real-time Analysis — Continuous monitoring ensures consistent, safe treatment sessions
features.proResults: Professional Results — Salon-quality hair removal in the comfort of your home

smartApp.title: Smart App IPL Hair Removal Device
smartApp.desc: Seamlessly connect your IPL device via Bluetooth to our SmartApp. Enjoy guided treatments, real-time session tracking, personalized routines, and AI-powered insights. Control intensity levels, monitor progress, and receive reminders—all from your smartphone.

features.aiPlans: Personalized treatment plans via AI analysis
features.realTimeControl: Real-time intensity control and on-screen feedback

shipping.a: Absolutely. We offer reliable worldwide shipping to support your business wherever you are.

customization.q: Can I customize the device functions?
customization.a: Yes, we offer full customization of features, colors, packaging, and more to fit your brand needs.

certifications.a: We support FDA, CE, RoHS, and other global certifications to ensure compliance in your target markets.

leadTime.q: How long is the production lead time?
leadTime.a: Typical lead time is 25-35 days after sample approval, depending on order size and customization.

afterSales.a: Yes, we offer comprehensive after-sales service including technical support and warranty.

hero.title: Your Satisfaction, Guaranteed
hero.subtitle: Experience risk-free B2B partnership with iShine. Our commitment: comprehensive after-sales support, transparent policies, and industry-leading warranty coverage for all IPL hair removal devices.

scenarios.title: Typical After-Sales Scenarios
items: Not reviewing the user manual thoroughly before use
Using the device without confirming skin/hair type suitability
Selecting an energy level beyond personal skin tolerance
Unstable local voltage affecting device performance
Blade-induced scratches during pre-treatment
Device not fully contacting skin or not held at a 90° angle
Sensitive skin experiencing pronounced discomfort
Product or packaging damaged during shipping
Skipping pre-use shaving, leading to hair burns
Not wearing protective goggles, resulting in eye discomfort or injury
Other unforeseen causes

prevention.title: How to Avoid These Issues
items: Read the User Manual: Review all guidelines and contraindications before first use.
Check Suitability: Confirm your skin and hair type match device recommendations.
Start Low, Go Slow: Always begin with the lowest energy setting; increase only if comfortable.
Voltage Check: Ensure your local voltage matches device requirements.
Pre-Shave Properly: Shave treatment areas to avoid hair burns.
Wear Safety Goggles: Always use provided eye protection.
Correct Device Angle: Maintain full contact and a 90° angle between device and skin.
Gentle Handling: Avoid using blades or accessories that may cause injury.
Unbox Carefully: Inspect for shipping damage before use.
For Sensitive Skin: Test on a small area first; discontinue if discomfort occurs.

commitments.title: Our Response & Service Commitments

warranty.title: 1-Year Limited Warranty
warranty.description: If your device malfunctions due to manufacturing defects within one year, we will repair or replace it at no cost.

return.title: Risk-Free 365-Day Return Policy
return.description: Try iShine beauty tools risk-free. If dissatisfied, return the product within 365 days for a refund.

moneyBack.title: 90-Day Money-Back Guarantee
moneyBack.description: Not satisfied within the first 90 days? Contact us for a full refund. No questions asked.

commitments.note: Note: The 90-day money-back guarantee is for product dissatisfaction. The 1-year warranty covers manufacturing defects or malfunctions during normal use. Refunds are not available after 90 days, but warranty coverage continues for the remainder of the year.

returnsTerms.title: Returns & Terms
returnsTerms.returnWindow: Return Window: 90 days from delivery for money-back guarantee.
returnsTerms.process: Process: Contact us before returning any product. Unauthorized returns may be refused.
returnsTerms.exclusions: Exclusions: Orders via Tapjoy or in-game currency are final sale and not eligible for return.
returnsTerms.refunds: Refunds: Processed to the original payment method upon receipt and inspection. Allow up to 30 days for credit processing.
returnsTerms.warrantyExclusions: Warranty Exclusions: Damage from misuse, unauthorized modifications, accidental damage, or failure to follow instructions is not covered. Issues arising from not following device suitability guidelines or improper operation are excluded from warranty coverage.

insights.title: Data-Driven Insights
insights.failureRate: Over 80% of reported device failures are linked to incorrect operation or ignoring suitability guidelines.
